title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, objectives, and timeline. Establish project management processes and communication channels.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct user research, gather requirements, and analyze existing narrative therapy techniques and best practices.

title: System Architecture Design
description:
Design the overall system architecture, including the AI model, user interface, data storage components, and integration with third-party services (if applicable). Consider the following aspects:

1. AI Model Architecture: Determine the appropriate type of AI model (e.g., transformer-based, RNN, etc.) and the specific architecture (e.g., GPT, BERT, etc.) for the narrative therapy task. Consider the model's ability to understand and generate natural language, as well as its capacity for emotional intelligence and context understanding.

2. User Interface: Design the user interface for both the client-side (e.g., web or mobile app) and the therapist/admin interface. Consider the user experience, accessibility, and intuitive navigation.

3. Data Storage: Determine the data storage requirements, including user data, session transcripts, and any other relevant data. Consider data privacy, security, and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., HIPAA).

4. Integration: Identify any potential third-party services or APIs that may need to be integrated, such as natural language processing services, sentiment analysis tools, or knowledge bases.

5. Scalability and Performance: Ensure that the architecture can handle increasing user loads and data volumes while maintaining acceptable performance levels.

6. Security and Privacy: Implement appropriate security measures to protect user data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards.

7. Monitoring and Logging: Incorporate monitoring and logging mechanisms to track system performance, identify issues, and facilitate debugging and maintenance.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train the AI model for narrative therapy, incorporating natural language processing and machine learning techniques.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the application, ensuring a seamless and intuitive experience for users.

title: Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for user data and therapy sessions.

title: Security and Privacy Implementation
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with privacy regulations for handling sensitive user data.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the various components and perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment, implement continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and manage infrastructure and monitoring.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for users and developers, and establish user support channels.
